title: fathafraink
author: fathafraink
content: #Things to be Prepared   1. Mining Software or Mining Software, Download here: https://github.com /paw-digital/PawMining/releases/download/v1.0/paw-mining-win.zip   2. Address or Address $PAW - To Receive Coin $PAW (Address or Address $PAW You Can Create Via Browser: https://wallet.paw.digital/[/url ] )   Or You Can Get $PAW Wallet Address Through Playstore: [url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.pawdigital.wallet&pcampaignid=pcampaignidMKT-Other-global-all-co-prtnr- py-PartBadge-Mar2515-1]https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.pawdigital.wallet&pcampaignid=pcampaignidMKT-Other-global-all-co-prtnr-py-PartBadge-Mar2515- 1#Coin Mining Tutorial $PAW   1. Extract or Move Existing "paw-mining" Folder In "paw-mining-win.zip" to Any Directory/Location.Example :    2. Open Folder "paw-mining" and Run File "run_windows.bat" By Double Clicking (Without Run As Administrator).Example :   3. After Open If the Command Prompt (CMD) is as shown below, please Paste or Paste your $PAW Coin Address (Right click to Paste in CMD or the Command Prompt).Example:   4. Then Click "ENTER" and Please Wait Until It Will Start Mining Automatically.Note : If You Have Fairly Qualified Hardware, You Can Change The Port Or Settings As Below. Hostname: mining.paw.digitalPort: 4444Username: Your Paw addressAlgo: rx/0 (RandomX)Difficulty: 275000 ( For High End Devices ) "The increase rate increases with this arrangement, so does income".Source : https://paw.digital/rewards   https://github.com/paw-digital/PawMining/releases/
